mapper.sql: c.id, (select object from evaluate where id=c.evaluate) object, (select cardename from carde where id=c.carde) cardename, (select evaluateName from evaluate where id=c.evaluate) evaluateName, (select evaluateCode from evaluate where id=c.evaluate)evaluateCode, (select name from target where id=c.name) name, c.target1, c.target2, c.target3, c.target4
mapper.select:
select
from collect c left join evaluate a on a.id=c.evaluate left join carde b on b.id=c.carde left join target d on d.id=c.name where 1 = 1
and b.cardename like '%${cardename}%'
and a.object like '%${object}%'
and d.name like '%${name}%'
and a.evaluateName like '%${evaluateName}%'
order by ${column} ${sort}
